title: Hong Kong set for 'worst ever' wave of layoffs, store closures
subtitle:
More than 5,600 retail jobs could be lost and thousands of stores shut down over the next six months.

Related: HK police defuse homemade bombs left in school grounds designed 'to kill and to maim'
